title: Tour de France winner Egan Bernal fined $500 for tossing out trash
content:
Zero tolerance for litterbugs: 2019 Tour de France champion is latest rider nabbed by the UCI's 'litter patrol' and a second offense will trigger a one-minute time penalty.

Read the full article at Tour de France winner Egan Bernal fined $500 for tossing out trash on Velo.
author: ahood
